rules.name: New_Case_Notification_alt_emails_Core_MSP_Sonian
rules.label: New Case Notification - alt emails - Core/MSP/Sonian

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_Core
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - Core

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_MSP
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 10 AND 11

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - MSP

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_Sonian
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - Sonian

rules.name: MSP_email_on_RMA_Case_closed_for_its_Serial

rules.name: Case_Status_Change
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (((2 OR 3) AND 4) OR (2 AND (5 OR 6)))
rules.label: Case Status Change

Flow.description: Consolidating all the Case Technical Support Record Type Workflow Rule Email Alerts + SFDC-18734 + SFDC-18933 + SFDC-19120 + SFDC -19095 + SFDC-19291 + SFDC-19261 + SFDC-19382 + SFDC-19358) + SFDC-19601 - SFDC-19300

formulas.name: Body
formulas.expression: '#' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ' has a scheduled call back in the next 30 minutes.'

formulas.name: Title
formulas.expression: 'Case #' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ', Call back due in the next 30 minutes'

Flow.label: TS Case Workflow Email Alerts
